item.title: Israel intercepts Gaza flotilla and detains activists including Greta Thunberg
item.description: South Africa and Turkey have criticised the incident in international waters. Israel says those on board are safe.

item.title: Watch: Two Delta passenger planes collide at LaGuardia Airport
item.description: One flight attendant sustained a minor injury following the low-speed, taxiway collision.

item.title: 'My pay is being held hostage': Federal workers on US government shutdown
item.description: Government staff describe their uncertainty during a budget impasse - though not all of them oppose the shutdown.

item.title: Benidorm cracks down on lewd t-shirts and items in shop windows
item.description: Authorities fear souvenirs with jokes and sexual messages on them are hurting the area's image.

item.title: Kenyan activists abducted in Uganda, opposition leader says
item.description: Bobi Wine says the two Kenyans were "picked up mafia-style" because they had joined his campaign.
